title: Uploading league of legends gameplay with voice commentary and camera on youtube?
body: Hello everyone! I would like to ask if its possible to monetize my league of legends gameplay on youtube some people says that I need permission from riot but others says I can Im gonna do a voice commentary & camera like Im streaming on twitch but it'll be uploading the content on youtube instead. Please Advise. Thank you.

replies.body: As long as your content is freely available, you should be okay.  Just make sure to go through everything in our[ legal jibber jabber page](https://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber) to make sure you've covered everything.  It sounds like you have an exciting project head of you!  Good luck, have fun!
